Siref:I'm on my way Talos.

He gets out of his chamber and goes to the hull.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> 
> > Kenzo opened a com link to Talos "Talos, the female predacon looks
> > like she was overtaken by a large wave of energon, although it 
does
> > apear that she was shot in the leg by a lazer. The CR chambor 
should
> > be able to get her out of stasis lock in one or two minutes"
> >
> >
> 
> {Talos}
> 
>     Talos nodded listening to Kenzo's report, "Well get her 
reapired then
> bring her to the bridge I'd like to have a word with her. Check her 
for
> extra weapons before she regains conciousness as well..."
> 
>     Closing down the comm channel Talos listened to Siref's request 
for
> orders, "I sent Rattrap to inspect the hull of the ship for 
damages, an
> enormous job for one bot alone you could give him a hand out there."
